Package hippodrome

Class BettingCentre

  • java.lang.Object
    • hippodrome.BettingCentre

  • public class BettingCentre
extends java.lang.Object
    Place where the Spectators place their bets on the winning horse. As they come here to place their bets, they also come here to collect his (or hers) further gains, if such a scenario applies on a given race.
    Since:
    0.1
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Hugo Fragata, Rui Lopes

    • Field Detail

      • bettingQueue

        private java.util.Queue<java.lang.Integer> bettingQueue
        The waiting queue to contact the Broker on its tasks. This could be used while waiting to a Spectator place a bet, or while wainting to a Spectator go collect his (or hers) gains. This structure is granted by a LinkedBlockingQueue Java class, which performs a blocking queue under the logic of a linked list.

      • bets

        private Bet[] bets
        Internal structure of bets. This is an array of bets (issued by an entity called Bet). Here, each index is related to a specific Spectator with its identification number. This is applicable since we consider that the Spectators have sequential numbers.

      • winners

        private int[] winners
        Array of Spectator's identification numbers to whom the betting money should go. Its length represents the number of winners and its content is the set of Spectator's IDs of who won the bet.

      • numberOfHorses

        private int numberOfHorses
        Internal knowledge of the number of horses which are competing on track.

      • numberOfSpectators

        private int numberOfSpectators
        Internal knowledge of the number of spectators which are attendind and betting on the races.

      • moneyOnSafe

        private int moneyOnSafe
        Internal attribute of the Betting Centre which represents the amount of money which we have on our account, to perform the bets from the Spectator's.

      • amountPerWinner

        private int amountPerWinner
        Internal attribute of the Betting Centre which must contain the amount of money which should be given per winner, on a bet.

      • horsesOdds

        private int[] horsesOdds
        Array with the pairs Horse/Jockey odds.

      • horsesAbilities

        private int[] horsesAbilities
        Array with the pairs Horse/Jockey abilities

      • winner

        private int winner
        Internal attribute of winner as the horse identifier of the winning horse.

      • brokerHaveNotAcceptedTheBet

        private boolean brokerHaveNotAcceptedTheBet
        Condition variable for noticing when Broker have not accepted the bets yet.
        This is a condition variable of the placeABet(int, int, int) method.

      • winnersMustNotReceiveTheirMoney

        private boolean winnersMustNotReceiveTheirMoney
        Condition variable for noticing when Spectators must receive their money or not, if they have won the bet.
        This is a condition variable of the goCollectTheGains() method.

      • allWinnersAreNotOnBettingCentre

        private boolean allWinnersAreNotOnBettingCentre
        Condition variable for noticing when Spectators (winner ones) are at the Betting Centre or not.
        This is a condition variable of the honourTheBets() method.

      • winnersArrived

        private int winnersArrived
        Condition variable for noticing the number of winning Spectators who arrived at this Betting Centre.
        This is a condition variable of the goCollectTheGains() and it is reset on the areThereAnyWinners() method.

      • repository

        private GeneralInformationRepository repository
        The GeneralInformationRepository instance where all this region's actions will be reported.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BettingCentre

        public BettingCentre​(int numberOfHorses,
                     int numberOfSpectators,
                     GeneralInformationRepository repository)
        Creates a Betting Centre.
        This constructor creates a Betting Centre giving a number of pairs Horse/Jockeys, a number of Spectators. Plus, an instance of the repository is also given in order to report status changes on the course of its actions.
        Parameters:
        numberOfHorses - the number of pairs Horse/Jockeys which will compete against one another.
        numberOfSpectators - the number of Spectators which will attend the events.
        repository - an instance of a GeneralInformationRepository in order to report all the actions and log each and every moment.

    • Method Detail

      • acceptTheBets

        public void acceptTheBets​()
                   throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Changes the state of the Broker to Waiting for Bets (WFB) and waits till the last placeABet(int, int, int) is done by a Spectator.
        This method also notifies the Spectators when the bets are accepted.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if the wait() is interrupted.

      • honourTheBets

        public void honourTheBets​()
                   throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Changes the state of the Broker to Settling Accounts (SA) and waits till the last goCollectTheGains() is done by a Spectator.
        This method also notifies the Spectators when the Broker is about to give their money.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if the wait() is interrupted.

      • placeABet

        public int placeABet​(int spectator,
                     int bet,
                     int horse)
              throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Changes the Spectator's state to Placing a Bet (PAB) and lets a Spectator place a bet onto the BettingCentre.
        This bet, made by a specific spectator is done respecting a proper horse, which represents a pair Horse/Jockey.
        After all the Spectators have placed their bets, the Broker will then accept them.
        Parameters:
        spectator - an identification of a Spectator which represents a better.
        bet - an amount of money represented as an integer, which the spectator wants to bet.
        horse - the identification of the pair Horse/Jockey in which the spectator wants to bet.
        Returns:
        the amount of money which was accepted by the Broker to place the bet.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if the wait() is interrupted.

      • goCollectTheGains

        public int goCollectTheGains​()
                      throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Changes the Spectator's state to Collecting the Gains (CTG) and lets a spectator collect all his (or hers) gains after being placed a bet and a race had ended.
        After the Broker alerted that its honouring the bets, each Spectator must then execute this method in order to collect its gains.
        Returns:
        the amount of money collected by the spectator, as an integer.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if the wait() is interrupted.

      • setHorseJockeyWinner

        public void setHorseJockeyWinner​(int winner)
        Sets the local variable of winner as the horse identifier of the winning horse.
        Parameters:
        winner - winner horse identification.

      • haveIWon

        public boolean haveIWon​(int spectatorId)
        Verification if a given Spectator identified with spectatorId has won his (or hers) bet.
        Parameters:
        spectatorId - identification of Spectator who has placed a bet earlier and wants to verify if it did win indeed or not.
        Returns:
        true if spectator has won his (or hers) bet; otherwise, it will return false.

      • areThereAnyWinners

        public boolean areThereAnyWinners​()
        Verification of bet's winners.
        Returns:
        true if anybody had won indeed; otherwise it will return false.

      • getNumberOfHorses

        public int getNumberOfHorses​()
        Returns number of horses that the BettingCentre has knowledge of.
        Returns:
        number of horses, as an integer.

      • setAbility

        public void setAbility​(int horse,
                       int ability)
                throws UnknownHorseJockeyException
        Sets the ability of a pair Horse/Jockey on a internal structure in order to evaluate its odds later.
        Parameters:
        horse - the identification of the pair Horse/Jockey.
        ability - the ability of the pair Horse/Jockey identified with horse.
        Throws:
        UnknownHorseJockeyException - if the pair Horse/Jockey horse does not exists.

      • evaluateOdds

        private void evaluateOdds​()
        Evaluates the odds of all the pair Horse/Jockey.

      • sumOf

        private int sumOf​(int[] array)
        Retrives the sum of all elements of an array array.
        Parameters:
        array - the array with the elements to sum.
        Returns:
        the value of the sum of all elements of the array array.
